website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a cat toy gift set that's affordable and includes an impressive assortment, you'd have a difficult time finding a better value or variety for your money.
pros: Impressive assortment for a low price
Some highlights include feather toys, soft mice, and a teaser wand
Also comes with a 2-way tunnel that collapses for storage
cons: A few toys in the set feel flimsy and cheaply made
Toy varieties vary per set, and some contain foam balls that can easily be torn apart and ingested by rambunctious cats

customer_reviews.title: These toys almost killed my cat.
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful with the red foam balls. My cat tore one apart easily and ate the pieces of it, had a blockage in his intestine, and had to have surgery to have it removed. Avoid buying cheap toys, it'll save you a heck of a veterinarian bill later on down the line. The rest of the toys in this pack are ok, but there is no reason to give a cat a soft foam ball toy. Again, please be careful and don't make the mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Decent variety - good for rotating
customer_reviews.text: There’s a good variety so you’re likely to hit on something your kitty likes. Mine didn’t really use the tunnel (except the time I took the pic below, haha). She really loves the teaser wand. I attached the large hard fish (it’s wrapped in thick twine) to it and it’s even better...It’s been a month and the wand did break in half, but that’s probably my fault for tying something to it and also being pretty rough with it. I also like that there are a lot of toys to rotate every few days. Maya also likes the little rainbow colored ball and the big roly ball with the mouse attached to it.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love them
customer_reviews.text: I got a litter of foster kittens and needed toys STAT! This fit the bill nicely. There are many different toys and textures, and the kittens are having ball. I will say that some items have feathers, faux tails, etc that I don’t feel comfortable leaving with the kittens unattended because they could be choking hazards. However, there are many items like the balls that I can leave in their cage. I’ve had these almost a week and the toys have held up well to 3 six week old kittens. Happy with this order and the price. You would pay double or more if you purchased these separately in a pet store. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tins

customer_reviews.title: 5 PLUS STARS I would give 10 if I could for the quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This was a weekend of fun !!! These cat toys are not junk !! For 20 pieces including a tunnel and a cat tail play stick and all the other little fun toys cats love you cannot beat the $12.99 price !! I am buying a few other sets to donate to local rescues. If you have a cat you will not be unhappy, and if you want to help out a rescue with out breaking your bank buy one or two of these and donate them.
customer_reviews.author: SAVY BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! It is worth the $13- even though not all of the toys are very exciting. She loves the long strip of fabric (we tied one of the red crinkle bows on it) and she has a blast chasing it around until we are tired! We took one of the fabric mice and put it inside the ziplock bag of catnip for three or four days...she hasn't stopped playing with it! We are slowly pulling toys out one by one and letting her have fun. We haven't used the tunnel yet...that will be a whole other playtime! Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: sandb365

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all...
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat the toy selection for this price. There are lots of options to keep my new kitten busy and I have held back half the toys to replace some when they get worn or add new ones to the mix when he gets bored. The tunnel gets a lot of attention, but the weight of the toys hanging in the picture just makes them roll to the bottom (darn gravity), but he likes the ties better anyway. :) The cats liked it so much, I ended up getting a set for a friend as well...
customer_reviews.author: Nurdigirl

customer_reviews.title: Got all pieces, even though wrong.
customer_reviews.text: You do get 20 pieces of toys however you don't get exactly to the tee what they say they give you. For instance they have listed 3 crinkle balls and 3 cotton mice, but I received 4 crinkle balls and 2 cotton mice. Something minor and I don't really care much about because I still got 20 pieces but for those who want exactly what it says, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Khadine Wright

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY The products use harsh dyes that can effect your animals, my cat likes to play with his in the water dish, and now he has pink dye that isn’t washing off all over him, he is a white cat so it’s very obvious
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Fornasari

customer_reviews.title: BESTA TOYS AND VALUE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve found this earlier! I spent about $100 in other types of toys on here and at pets mart. Wow! Makes you realize how much they overcharge for you at stores! This is by far the best condo and value for your money. They don’t look of feel cheap! And let’s be honest the ones at stores aren’t better quality. I know, I’ve spent over $500 shipping for my 6 cats! I loved every single toy! Gave them 10 first and saving the rest to give to them as they others break!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer80877

customer_reviews.title: Variety of quality of toys, great value. Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Im big on reviews.....so look let me just say I'm super happy with this purchase. It comes with a good amount of toys, 1 tunnel, and a teaser toy...a few of the toys were really cool and interactive..great value for 13 bucks cant go wrong...my kitten loves her new toys. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is the tunnel is not only really cheaply made...but it stinks! Like bad plastic! But honestly for 13 bucks for all these toys...cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it
customer_reviews.text: It is not how it looks in the picture. The stick has no string on it at all. The other toys are literally garbage. My cat liked the box better than the toys. The green tube was fine but not worth it to keep it all. I’ll look for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My sometimes finicky about toys kitten like these
customer_reviews.text: A wide variety of different types of toys. I have a kitten and a barely adult who was a kitten a few months ago but thinks he's still a little kitten although he weighs 9 lbs! He doesn't know his own strength and often breaks toys then sits there looking at them as if he doesn't understand what happened LOL. So far he hasn't broken anything and plays with 90% of the toys. The baby who is 7 months and sometimes acts smugly disinterested in 75% of toys you give her (but plays inside of a grocery bag or an Amazon shipping box for hours of course) likes 70% of these toys. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard
customer_reviews.text: The toys broke within a day, we tried rotating out the toys but no luck. The feathers fell off the tails, the ears popped off the heads of the mice, and the raffia toys completely unraveled. We have to get rid of them because we were sincerely concerned that the remainder of the toys would become a choking hazard based on the other ones being of such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Absoluetly love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We foster litters kittens and so we needed to find a way to keep them entertained. We looked at pet stores and online and sure we found some things but they could be kinda pricey for not very much. This is not the case for this item! You get so many toys for a cheap price! It’s fun to switch out the toys and they absoluetly LOVE the tunnel. Also, these toys are pretty durable! Kittens are very destructive and they have been holding up! And if one ever does break, it can easily be replaced by one of the other 20 toys it comes with! Anyways, VERY happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but rather low quality toys
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a grab bag of 20 pieces. Some are good, some are just okay and some are not good at all. The tunnel is small but its still a nice little toy and my kittens like it. Some of the other toys are okay but some are very poor quality and my kittens destroyed/ruined them in the first day. I like the wand toy bc it doesnt have any ribbon or feathers on it. Overall, its not a bad deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of cat toys!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, it's a bag full of cat toys. My kitty likes most of them (she loves the wand with the leopard print streamer, the mice, the jingling balcrinkly the crinkly balls) but doesn't care for a few of the toys (the ones made with twine material or the mouse on the weighted ball). I like that there are several of each of her favorites so if one goes missing I have a replacement on hand. She enjoys chasing stuff through the tunnel but has grown a lot and can't turn around in it anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Never enough toys
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was searching for just a cat tunnel for my kitten. When I saw this for about the same price as the tunnel I was looking at plus having the benifit of boosting my kitten's toy box I was sold. I expected a cheaply made tunnel and being that this is my first cat and cat tunnel I can't say for sure its not cheap but he enjoys playing with it and bonus ha actually adores the tiny balls that come in the bag. I think if he were an adult cat the size would worry me on the little red balls but the a the perfect size to be batted around by my tiny kitten
customer_reviews.author: RH in VA

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of toys
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kittens and they have so much fun with these toys. Some of them are heavier than they can bat around so it’s nice that there is a variety of toys that can be used at different stages of their growth. The foam rainbow balls are their favorite. They also love playing in the tunnel. They even enjoy playing with the ties on the tunnel ends. The kitty wand gets used by my step daughter and the kitties. No complaints here, only fun.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Great collection of toys for ferrets!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these toys for my ferrets and they love them! Before they were bored and would just play with anything they could get a hold of in their cage, like their house, which I didn't want them to destroy. But now that they have these toys they aren't so destructive with everything else! So far they are holding together, but as for long term longevity I'm not sure since I've only had them a little over a week. But for the price and the amount of toys you get I would definitely buy again, whether or not they lasted long or not. And there's a big enough variety of different toys to keep my ferrets engaged and entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Quiksilver2101

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I really can’t complain how the quality of these considering the price point. I kind of figured they wouldn’t be that great but I bought them anyway bc you get so many little things for the price. There are some items that are decent and others that are just super cheap. It’s an average set of cat toys. The little pom pom things are pretty cheap but some of the balls are okay. Our kittens really liked the string attached to the stick but the stick part was flimsy plastic and broke within a couple of days. Overall it has been fun for my kids and kittens to play with but the quality isn’t great.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens not so much for older cats
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I accepted value over quality. The wand is very short so my cats dont get into it. My last wand was long. The tunnel is short and my cats loved running through a much longer tunnel. The toys are just for batting around which is good for some brief stimulation but they get bored quick. This is a great value for kittens who can entertain themselves for hours with anything but as for older cats, I'd pass. This is your product for people with kittens who will outgrow this probably after 2 years of age. So you want toys you didnt spend much money on and dont feel bad about giving or throwing away.
customer_reviews.author: Aprylle

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this when we got our kitten, the first we have ever had. It had a large selection of toys, which made it nice to find out which kind our kitten prefers. 3 weeks later, most of the toys are still intact, and we know which kind our kitten likes the best. Now I just need to find out where I can find another mouse attached to a weighted ball when this one wears out. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Landers

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your dollar.
customer_reviews.text: I love that they have the little tunnel which has strings you can attach more interesting toys to. All of the little foil pompoms were a big hit with my kitties but didn't last a month. To be honest, I plan to buy this again. After adding catnip to the bag(and hiding it overnight) evry tou became interesting to my 4 kitties. They are going through as fast as any store bought toys, but overall this is the cheaper route to go. Do NOT rely on the wand they include. My biggest kitty broke that after only 25 minutes lol. Most everything else is still entertaining them!
customer_reviews.author: Gwmoon

customer_reviews.title: Some of the toys are a choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: Some of the toys in the pack were easily broken by our cats and others posed to be what could be a possible problem with obstruction; one of the balls are made with a material that the cats can bite off and can injest - my cats are always eating random things. Also, these same balls are a choking hazard as they fit inside the mouth of a cat. With regards to some of the other products, they do the job to entertain the cats such as the included pop-open tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for quantity & quality of items!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for our new kitten and she has loved playing with all of the items included. We have given her a few at a time to keep her interest going and the variety has kept her entertained. The included tunnel has kept her going forever! This is a great variety of mostly good quality toys. A few were just the usual cheaply made toys that you find everywhere but for the most part they are good quality and a large variety. Great value for the quantity included. I will purchase this pack again as she loses them under the furniture and ?? wherever she ends up hiding them :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Held together by superglue
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our 2 kittens. I did take another reviewer's advice and took the eyes off the toys. They basically fall off when touched so this wasn't difficult. The fish simulator is a cardboard cut out wrapped in small ropes. That lasted a few minutes. All of the toys are torn apart and broken at this point but they had a good time destroying them. The bottom line is these toys are not the best. They're put together with superglue and string, but if you want many toys the price is good. I dont regret buying them since they did last a week or two but I wouldn't purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend just going to the pet store and picking up ...
customer_reviews.text: The toys are very cheap and a few of them had to be thrown away. One of the toys was initially filled with some kind of sand or litter material and was broken inside the package causing every item in the bag to be covered in this sand. I had to wash all the toys that I didn't throw away. I would recommend just going to the pet store and picking up some toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lukasavage

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: Yes, you get a lot of toys but the are cheap and poorly made. They were such garbage that some were literally already falling apart when I took them out of their packaging and those that I was able to actually give to my kitten didn’t survive more than a single day of being of being played with by a tiny kitten. Don’t waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: This was my cats' first experience with a tunnel and they LOVE it! They practically fight over it. The toys are good quality - identical to what you would pay $2 or $3 apiece for, even at Walmart. This is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Matthews

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommended! +Endless Hours of play for cats and kittens +Durable +Great For Everyday use +Super Fast Shipping +High Quality +Great Packaging +Exactly as Described +Great Value +Highly Recommended -No Negatives Follow me at #TheJessOfAllTrades for Honest, Detailed Reviews & Updates of Products I Use Personally! Also always feel free to contact me with any questions about Items I Use and Recommend. . . Happy Shopping
customer_reviews.author: #TheJessOfAllTrades

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kittens and big cats too!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 adult cats, including 2 Mamas that just had 7 kittens between the 2 of them, so I needed an affordable way to figure out what would entertain them best. The variety of this pack let me see what they chose to play with so I could buy more of those specific toys. The tunnel has been surprisingly a hit with all 12 cats. It has proven durable even under a pouncing from my 16 lb cat. The cats love to chew on the strings that hold the tunnel in a collapsed position for storage, so keep an eye on that.
customer_reviews.author: jwise406

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety for the price, but they’re not all that durable. The cloth came off the wand the first time a kitten played with it, but I just tied it back on & they still play with it. One of the balls with a bell in it was not staying together so I threw it out instead of trying to glue it since I had those already anyway. They love the tube so it is filled with little holes from nails & teeth and one of the wires is no longer in the sleeve, but they’re still playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: My cat is destruction on legs. He is constantly looking to amuse himself and needs stimulation to stop him getting into trouble or claiming non-cat items as his own. This package of toys has a little of everything. Some wont stand the test of time with a cat like mine, but all have provided him with fun and excitement. If you are looking for toys made with craftsmanship, these are not for you. If you want hours of entertainment, stimulation and a dozen ways to give your cat exercise... then this is great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Dallice Tylee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended by my cats
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love, love, love that tunnel. Who CARES if it rolls as one review complained? My cats think that's even more fun! One will run in the tunnel and another will pounce on the one inside and that cat will launch out like a cannon ball and another will run in. Also the kitty snake wand might as well be kitty crack. It shimmies on the the ground and my kitten will pounce and take the entire toy from me as her "kill." Enough toys for three cats to share and rotate. I might have to invest in a second tunnel though....
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat LOTS of Toys
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how well these would go over in my house I only have one cat and she's around 16 years. She's loved the toys and the best part is this comes with so many types and kinds I really do think there is something for every cat here. There are so many I have spares which is good for when she bats something somewhere impossible to recover it or the dog steals something. Has made her a very happy cat.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These cat toys are a fantastic deal! All of them are nice, they are all well made and our cats love them. Some of these toys would cost 3 to 4 dollars by themselves in a pet shop or grocery store, so these are a real bargain. The little tunnel is pretty nice also, it is lightweight and a bit small, but our cats like it as much as any other they have had. An extra feature that this tunnel has is a toy hanging from the top of one end, they like to play with it when they are in the tunnel. This is an adorable set and a great deal! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: GP AlaskaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So many toys in one purchase makes this well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: While these are not the highest quality toys, the sheer number of them makes it well worth the purchase. In fact it was a lifesaver when I recently adopted a kitten after not having a cat for over 15 years. I've brought the toys out a little at a time, bringing more out as the other ones disappear. (Where did they all go?!) And I love the tunnel thing and so does my kitten. Overall I'm very pleased and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bren LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These are the same toys you can get at most retailers for $1 each but seem to be the rejects from those companies. My cats are NOT particularly hard on toys. They've already destroyed about 1/3rd of them. It would be worse but I haven't given them all out. Some of them look so poorly made that I feel they are dangerous to even let my cats play with them under strict supervision. My advice is to skip this, I have found it a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ylva Raines

customer_reviews.title: Cat Crazy With Joy
customer_reviews.text: This package is well worth the money, and my cat went crazy with joy over the toys. With any toy lies a danger of being swallowed or broken, and as long as one regularly inspects the toys for breakage or defects, there is no real worry of my cat being harmed. My only complaint are the crinkly balls which I tossed out due to worries of having my kitten's mouth or eyes injured by the material. I'll buy another one of these packages when these toys have worn out!
customer_reviews.author: CCrystals121Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful bag of Kitty goodies!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got this Youngforever bag of cat toys. My cat is having a great time, the variety is good, lots of different things to put out and enough to give a gift or two to his friends. He loves the little tunnel, the leopard tail on a stick and the little pom poms. But best of all I can put a few out and then take them up and put a new selection out! Thanks Amazon for carrying such great cat toys.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma G.

customer_reviews.title: Great package for kittens
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pack for 2 kittens we adopted recently and they love it. It has a big variety of toys, and they already have some favorites. The tunnel is a little smaller than I expected because I didn't read the description. It's a fine size for the kittens but a big cat would take up the whole space. Really, there's so much stuff that the kittens are set for toys for a long time. They are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: suellen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely cheaply made toys the wand with a string broke within seconds but my cat still plays with the string and wand just separately. My cat plays with almost all of the toys actually and nothing else has broken but for the price of $10 all the toys were worth it. My cat LOVES the tunnel he’s made a few tiny holes in it but I think that would happen with any tunnel made from that material. Overall not bad a good bunch of toys to start you off with.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta B

customer_reviews.title: So great for our new kitten to learn likes and rotate!
customer_reviews.text: We got this set when we were bringing home our newly adopted kitten! I think it is an amazing set to learn likes/dislikes of your cat and also gives you the opportunity to swap toys in and out to keep mixing it up. My cat LOVES playing with our dog in the tunnel, the leopard wand and esp the crinkle balls. We would not have bought all these different types of toys individually but I am so happy to have these to keep him entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain bag of colorful kitty toys! Don't expect them to last long-that's not what kitten toys are for- especially good for growth stage of "pounce & destroy" (4-8 mos) .These trifles are colorful and priced well. Hide them under furniture for kitty to discover for busy joy. Eye appeal: Attractively packaged so a nice gift as it arrives without extra wrapping. Like a baby gift, send to a friend with a new feline!
customer_reviews.author: Hoopla!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but effective
customer_reviews.text: These aren't built to last forever... especially if you have a cat like mine that is "lovingly destructive"... however they do hold his attention and the tunnel is great he absolutely loves that thing.... it has 2 to us that hang inside it that he likes but mostly running thru it is his favorite part. Some toys with the lil fur on em have since been "de-constructed " but there was so much kn the bag...he still has PLENTY to play with..... I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeron H.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of different toys for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Though I didn’t give the sturdiness or thickness a good review, I do like all the toys this package comes with, which is A LOT! So many toys for a great price. I love the little tunnel, it’s so cute. I don’t really see my cat play with any of the items, but I know she does because they’re always moved around. She really loves the mouse toys with hair on them. I’ve broken a few of the plastic balls by stepping on them :(
customer_reviews.author: Redkat981

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it 🤷🏽‍♀️ I love the variety of toys it provides, a lil bit of everything. And because it's such a big quantity it will take her a long time to get bored. Tunnel was a bit small (that's on me though cause I didnt even check visually the dimensions provided) but my cat doesn't seem to care. Overall I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Seaside

customer_reviews.title: Cute but BEWARE of nerf rainbow play balls!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves the toys. The only concern BEWARE is the soft rainbow nerf balls are a choking hazard as my kitty chewed it up into pieces and threw up what she ate. I had to throw the other rainbow ball away. Other then that, all toys are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but really ok too!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and you don't pay a lot for all these cat toys. Are they good quality? No. Are they coming apart? Some are. But our kitten loves them and it isn't like you paid a lot of money for them. We put them out all over the floor and our kitten thinks he died and went to heaven. He fell asleep among them, woke up, looked around, and started playing full tilt boogie again. These are great and I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Tea Please

customer_reviews.title: Kitten and wallet approved!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has absolutely everything in it! Excellent choices (rolling balls, mice with feathers, paper-sounding squishy things). Love the little leopard wand that lets me playfully interact with my new kitten. Olivia has spread out half the toys all around the house, so the ones in the pics are just the ones I could find lol Also, for the price, these are awesome. I’ve looked in Walmart, Petsmart and the Dollar Tree and for the price, all these toy options had those stores beat! The green tunnel is a tad smaller than what I thought it’d be, but Olivia clearly doesn’t mind. Will most definitely be purchasing these again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Get it. Your cat will love the tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t even gotten to most of the toys yet, but both my 3 month old kitten and my nearly 16 year old dog are having a blast w/ the tunnel. As far as the toys, they are cheap. I agree w/ the previous recco to remove eyes and bits, especially w/ kittens. So far, the crinkle balls and the jute covered balls are a hit. ETA - The fabric covered springs are potentially dangerous. The spring end is tipped with vinyl under the fabric, but once exposed could put an eye out.
customer_reviews.author: ThoseThingsILov

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy variety
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 cats and each of them likes to play with a different type of toy and it's just fun getting new toys. One of the cats is a foster who isn't integrated with the others yet and wanted to get her some special toys as well. We have one tunnel and wanted to get her a tunnel as well, but she hasn't taken to it yet. She enjoys the mouse with feather tail, though. It's nice to see her having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C.

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are important
customer_reviews.text: I read another review where her cat ate one of the toys and gave himself an intestinal block. I hope the cat is in recovery and doing well. I took a star down because of that reason no cats should endure illness like that. With that said, here's one of mines in the tunnel. All my cats seem to like the toys but I pray to god they don't have to endure what that other cat did.
customer_reviews.author: Mahiya H.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my cat. Not all of the items that came in the box does she play with, but she loves all the mice with feathers and the string with the wand . I kept a few items in the box as to not overwhelm her and she found the box the other day and started digging out new toys. She's not too young anymore but she acts like a kitten with these toys. I would definitely recommend this box.
customer_reviews.author: Crdavis116

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: When buying this, I thought it might not be the best quality because it was such a low price. Each toy is made of great quality and will take forever for my kitten to destroy. Though, he already separated the string from the pole but that's normal for him. I retied it and it's fine. I recommend to all my friends to buy this. Knowing it's quality makes me feel like I stole it. The yarn on the balls is the stiff kind that kitties love - like twin.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new cat owners
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter set for anyone adopting a kitten or adult cat. Plenty of toys to see what your furry friend is into. My 4-month old kitten loves the crinkly balls, mini tunnel, bouncy toys, and the teaser wand (which I attached one of the other toys to). The cons is that they're very cheaply made toys, so they might fall apart after some usage, but for 50~ cents each, it's a nice starter kit and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Tam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good assortment of cat toys
customer_reviews.text: The wand only had the stick part -- no "whip," but the tunnel, squiggles, and assortment of mice and stuff is a good buy compared to the price(s) you would pay for many individual packets of "mice" and similar toys in the store pet aisles. Different colors and textures. I put them in a medium-size container and pour catnip in and shake. Makes the toys even more enticing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gill

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a bag of cat toys, 1 tunnel (short)
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty average kitty toys with one or two unique ones. It was a good price for the amount included. I'm only giving 4 stars instead of 5 just because the tunnel is short and a little flimsy. There is confusion with the way the description is worded as far as how many tunnels are included, it's just one tunnel. The only positive thing I can say about that is it has little ties on the end so I was able to tie it on to another one of their tunnels to make it longer
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Allen

customer_reviews.title: The stuffing or toys and eyes and anything came off can end up in your cats belly
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cheap quality product, I mean you get what you pay for. My cats enjoyed for short time. Mostly Everything is torn apart and thrown out after couple weeks of use. The tunnel is not safe to use wires came out shortly after I received the item. Plus a lot of stuff from toys were eaten by my cats since it was torn apart easily. I wouldn’t recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for your young kittens!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had a litter about 4 or 5 weeks ago. And of course they're all indoors so I got this for an entertainment system. It's fantastic the simplest toy is the one they like the most. The variety of toys gives them a real challenge every day for play. They've really developed a lot since getting this. they're more confident and more independent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great toys, though I don’t know how durable they are yet
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves all of his new toys, and loves how he now has so many! The assortment of toys keeps him very entertained throughout the day and he absolutely loves his new tunnel. I’ve only had the toys for a few days, so I don’t know how durable they are. He’s broken toys in the past, such as feather toys on a string, and some toys in this pack seem to be lower quality (such as the crinkly ball toys), but none of them are broken yet. Overall, the toys are wonderful; my cat loves them; and even though some seem to be made cheaply, it’s a good deal for the price and the quantity of toys.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Low Budget Gifts on Demand
customer_reviews.text: Cat tested. Cat approved. You want durability out of pet toys? Pffffft. Look, these things were super affordable, super cute, my cat loves them. What's not to like? He also tears real mice to shreds so what chance really do little pieces of plastic and cloth stand? For the money -- awesome. Variety -- Wonderful. I prefer to hide the whole thing and dole them out to my kitty a little at a time. They're like pressies on a weekly basis so he doesn't get too bored.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lady

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first off, he’s spoiled. Second, he loves to run into the tunnel then peek out to play with the balls! He enjoys the added fun of those! The assortment of toys that came with it were nice too but the best part was it fit perfectly in the hole for the Large Cat Bed (also pictured & reviewed). He really likes them together! Totally worth the money to get both!!
customer_reviews.author: JoniBrew

customer_reviews.title: My kitten looks happy :)
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves the toys. He is very smart and picky about what toys to play with, and he gets bored of certain types of toys quickly (he does seem to come back to old toys sometimes). I'm glad I have many toys for him and have been giving him a couple of them at a time. He enjoys the little mouth toy and the tunnel, in particular. :)
customer_reviews.author: Marielle

customer_reviews.title: Great variety for the price
customer_reviews.text: We got this (to get a variety of toys) when we adopted our kitten in June. There are many items she loves to play with: blue star, rainbow foam balls, springs and the mice, but her absolute favorite item is what we call ribbon stick. It’s the acrylic stick with fabric attached. She loves this so much!! She drags it around the house (you can hear her coming with it) and lays it across your feet. Usually when I’m getting ready for work. I’ve woken up in the morning with ribbon stick next to me in my bed. She just can’t get enough of it!
customer_reviews.author: Margo S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Playful Kitty
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... I've had my 1yr old cat for about 9 months, I never bought him any toys either.. sad I know but he is a pretty chill relaxed cat. That's what I love about him. But for Christmas I thought I'd give the toy thing a try and see I got this big bag of toys for him. I gave him a few and, My cat absolutely loved every single one! There were so many toys to pick from too and he plays with all of them. Everyday and every night lol I'm glad I got this for him for Christmas cause he seems to be very happy now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens!
customer_reviews.text: This package is worth its weight in gold! My Maine Coon kitty just loves the tunnel and the wand but his favorite things are the little plastic spring type things. He carries them all over the house batting them around and then carries them right back inside the tunnel. None of the cats seem very interested in the little furry things yet.
customer_reviews.author: Averie Nash

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love how many pieces come with this! Different things too like stuffed mice, crinkle balls, balls with bells, teaser wand, and a tunnel for my crazy kittens to run threw. Absolutely worth the price, love how it came packaged together in a zipper bag, I am using it to store some of the toys to give them later. My cats go nuts with these toys 😆 I would definately recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Pack
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a 3 y/o red tabby in August. I wanted to have a few toys around, but wasn't sure what he might like best so I bought this assorted pack to start him off! He loves many of the toys in this pack, especially the crinkly tinsel balls, wand, the small mice and the tunnel (he's actually obsessed with the tunnel). I would highly recommend this assorted pack if you're getting started with a new feline friend or if you just want lots of variety!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves the whole kit
customer_reviews.text: My kitten absolutely loves every item the tunnel is his favorite. For the price, this is the most cat toys you can get they are quality items made of yarn 🧶 much better than I expected. I will definitely be ordering this again because I know he’s going to lose all of these little toys by having too much fun by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Webster

customer_reviews.title: Cat Toys
customer_reviews.text: You get a wide variety of cat or kitten toys in this package. Variety in the types of toys so kitten or cat does not get bored. I would not recommend you put them all out at once. Little by little so cat does not get bored. Made very well. Assorted sizes of toys. This a very good buy the package cost much less than what you pay at a department store.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very happy with this purchase. He especially likes the leopard looking ribbon" toy on a stick" and plays with it a lot. He also likes the ball with feathers and the other balls. He has used the tube toy, but being a very large cat, I think he gets a little claustrophobic when he tries to sit in it. VERY NICE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Turquoise  Mood

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These toys are not fancy. Made with low-quality materials. One of the toys was full of sand and came broken open, so everything was covered in sand. I had to throw that one out. Others my 7-week old kitten destroyed right away. I probably wouldn't buy this product again, but I'm not going to go through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine DeLude

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel ripped 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The tunnel they loved the most. Too bad the metal wire pops out. After a few weeks the metal popEd out creating a dangerous situation. I fixed the protruding wire 5 times. I also used a glue gun to seal the area. Last repair it ripped again in a week. The other toys are cute for babies. My 3 yr olds don’t have much interest in the other toys.
customer_reviews.author: James and Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great toys and great value
customer_reviews.text: My kittens loved every one of these toys. Their overall favorite i must say was the tunnel. They play with it every day so much so that the seam is starting to come undone, so it will need a couple stitches soon. The crinkle balls are their next favorite. Every toy here is perfect for kittens and cats. Very happy with this purchase and this was an incredible deal. Highly recommend these toys and the seller. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A

customer_reviews.title: The cheap stuff is alright.
customer_reviews.text: Cats tore into this. Liked the tube/tunnel and the string. Note: the string likes to tear and isn't very long. Also if you want to replace the string it is glued on very tight but if you can get it lose use gorilla glue with a sturdy rope/string. Handle for the string really bends like a big fish is on the line so its tough.
customer_reviews.author: Ouija

customer_reviews.title: So many different toy's to play with
customer_reviews.text: These cat toys were perfect for my little litter of five. A feral cat in my neighborhood had a litter of five kittens, I took them in at four weeks. They are so active so I ordered this set of toy's. Let me tell you they loved all the toys, especially the little lime green tunnel, the love it. Most of the ball toys ended up under my bed though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Fun Variety of Toys
customer_reviews.text: My cats are having a ball (literally and figuratively) with this collection and after a few weeks of heavy play, they are all still intact. The cats are enjoying the variety and especially love the balls covered in jute which they can up up with their claws. My only quibble is with the tunnel. It shows two balls attached to the top but the weight of the balls means the tunnel flips so the balls always rest on the floor and the cats have not shown any interest in it. I would buy again just for the rest of the toys.
customer_reviews.author: AKVA

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Out kitten fell in love with the toys inside this pack! His personal favorites are the tunnel, the crinkle toys, and the wand teaser. I didn't give this product full 5 stars due to the products being made pretty cheaply. Some of the items fell apart pretty quickly. Also, some of the toys are made a little small, so I was worried on it being a chocking hazard for our kitten. We will be buying more and replacements once his are worn out!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Sixx Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Toys for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Whenever we throw one of the toys on the floor, it keeps our cat busy for the next 30 to 45 minutes, until he tires himself out. We haven't given him every toy yet, we are saving them up, only introducing 1 new toy every few days, so we get the most value out of the collection. Our cat has enjoyed every toy, playing with them over and over. He doesn't get tired of them. We just have to find them after a few days after he knocks them under the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Kincheloe

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for first time-cat owners
customer_reviews.text: While I will probably never buy this pack of toys again, I highly recommend any new cat owners get this since it's cheap and offers so much variety to a cat whose preferences you don't yet know. We've bought lots of other toys for our cat and while he's had his favorites, strangely enough he finds the most joy with the springs and the green tunnel offered here. If we could buy just those items separately, we'd be set.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Better than dollar store
customer_reviews.text: Dollar store toys at better than dollar store price! Lol we’ve “lost” or gone through every toy from the pack so that should speak for itself - my cats LOVE to play with and stash these toys. The tunnel is their favorite to run through, then hide in and pounce on each other and the string toy on a stick is the only toy my fattest cat plays with! 4 happy kitties
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable toys, great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 month old rescue kitten 6 months ago and she still plays with all the toys and the tunnel. She LOVES the tunnel and even sleeps in it. LOL. All the other toys have held up nicely as well. Great entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: TexasDi

customer_reviews.title: Great variety to keep a kitten engaged.
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck! Purchased this for our new kitten and she is loving everything. We rotate them to keep her interested. It’s only been a couple of days so I can’t speak to how durable everything is. The tunnel is cute. But thin. The other toys seem good. Overall pleased with the variety and the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cat toys
customer_reviews.text: These toys are so cheap and not worth the money I spent on them. I’m going to send them back
customer_reviews.author: Riley Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I fostered 7 kittens and adopted one, the tunnel alone would have been worth it, but it comes with a ton of toys that were all big hits. Be aware that there is catnip in the bag, and one of the kittens started growling when playing with something that must have rubbed the catnip. She was fine when we took away that particular toy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McColaugh

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and my cat is amused. So many options of toys in here and my cat seems to love just about every one. The green roll up tunnel, the leopard print string stick, the tinsel-looking toys, and springs are some his favorite to name a few. But honestly he plays with everything. Can’t go wrong with this value. The variety is a great thing for the cat. When he’s bored of one toy, he becomes occupied with another.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive fun pack!
customer_reviews.text: Considering that most cat toys cost 3 dollars or more individually, this is wonderful. The crinkle tube is a perfect size for small to medium cat and my 3 month old kitten loves it. I put a paper bag at one end and it becomes a cave. It has a wobble ball with a mouse attached that she absolutely loses her mind over it. It also comes with a wand. Super good deal@
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer8

customer_reviews.title: My Crazy Cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat gets bored very quickly, so my furbaby has a TON of toys. I was very happy to find this variety of toys. When I opened the box, my cat went crazy and started playing with EVERYTHING. My Siberian is about 16 pounds, he is a bit too big for the little tunnel, but he has gone inside it a few times. I think I will give the tunnel away to friends smaller cat. He also likes the little leapord wand and some of the unique looking balls. For the price, you really can't beat this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Virata

customer_reviews.title: Tunnel problem.... average regular toys
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel toy is what I was really looking fwd to in the package for my 5 month old kitten but he doesn’t even play with it. Problem is is that the toys don’t stay upright. I’ll put it upright and it immediately rolls over putting the toys on the floor. The way I see it the strings are just WAY to heavy for the thin tunnel. Otherwise the other toys are your average regular toys.
customer_reviews.author: CatNTheHat

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally leave product reviews often as I’m a pretty busy person... but this was the BEST buy ever for my boy Simba! He is OBSESSED with EVERY toy that came in this!!!! They are his favorite toys! He won’t even touch the expensive ones I got from petco or DG. But these... unlimited fun! The eyes/ears on the mice do come off easy but my little guy doesn’t seem to try and eat the pieces so I’m not too worried. Those ones actually seem to be his favorite mice as shown in the picture! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Megan Traxler

customer_reviews.title: It's alright i guess
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. My kitten LOVES the tunnel, and it has held up well so far. The stick two broke in three uses, and my cat go sick because he decided to try to eat one of the crinkle-y balls, which came apart very easily, causing him to leave brightly covered "gifts" all over my apartment. The jingle balls broke as well, and all the feathers have been ripped from their toys. Its great to get bulk toys, but these are the only toys i've bought that my cats have ever been able to digest or ruin, so they aren't great quality. Will not restock from this set.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: This is so cheap for everything you get. I have 3 cats my cat who is older never plays with toys an each toy I give him he is loving an playing like a kitten makes me so happy to see him having fun. I have two small chihuahuas an they have a few different size balls in this bundle they are perfect for my little Chihuahua whi always want to play with a ball but they are always to big for their mouths. I will be buying this pack again once all the toys need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer robin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves several of the toys while others she couldn't care less about. That happens when you get this big of a variety, so I am not disappointed. I was hoping she would like the tunnel, but she is scared of it for the most part- it also doesn't stay upright with the toys hanging because of the weight distribution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me?? All this for that price?? Sold. My kitty loves all of the toys and the variety keeps her interested. Buy this, stop reading reviews, it’s a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hackmann

customer_reviews.title: Brief entertainment for a bored cat.
customer_reviews.text: The entertainment value was not lasting. My cat ripped the yarn off the balls almost immediately and got tired of the other toys after a day to a week. He occasionally likes to hide halfway in the tunnel. It turns out he did really like the catnip, anyway. For the price, it's probably reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Hanlin

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our new kitten. She is pretty rambunctious and it's hard to drain her energy. So we got this toy set and have had it for about 2 weeks. She loves it. Especially the tunnel and all the little balls. My 18 month old likes to throw her toys around too and she chases them. Entertaining for both of them haha!
customer_reviews.author: Gellysa

customer_reviews.title: Missing items but still good value!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a good value for your money, however the tunnel is MUCH smaller than it appears in photos (I have a Maine coon mix that is the same length as the tunnel) and the dangly toy hanging from the stick is missing altogether. So while I am bummed about those two things, my cat-baby is happy. 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy pack to figure out what your cat likes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I got a kitten to see what kind of toys he would like. It was a great value for the price and an easy way for my to try different toys without speding a lot of money and feeling bad when my cat didn't like it. I would reccomend this if you are trying to figure out what your cat would like.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne N. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love these especially the tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: We got these when they were very young, like 9 weeks. As they grow they use them more and more. They carry the smaller stuffed toy's around and I have the tunnel in a area where I can watch them battle with it! I'm amazed how well it is holding up and they can't get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: 2DMaxLST

product_meta.title: Youngever 24 Cat Toys Kitten Toys Assortments, 2 Way Tunnel, Cat Feather Teaser - Wand Interactive Feather Toy Fluffy Mouse, Crinkle Balls for Cat, Puppy, Kitty, Kitten
feature_bullets: KITTEN TOYS GREAT VALUE - 24 pieces cat toys with a collapsible Cat Tunnel, Cat Teaser Wand, Interactive Feather Toy, Fluffy Mouse, Crinkle Balls, Cat Springs and etc.
BUSY CATS, HEALTHY CATS - This assortment provides hours of exercise & self-amusement. It keeps your cat busy when you’re away. Burning off extra energy from your kitties.
INTERACTIVE - Bonding with your cats by teasing your cats and playing together.
WARNING -- Supervise pets during play to avoid ingestion of small parts, replace broken toys timely for the safety of your pets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars8,094 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
